category.name: 4GD
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: BOM_MARKUP_ADD_FONT_STYLE
preference.preference_description: Specifies the text font style when a user adds a markup to a BOM line in Structure Manager or a markup space in 4G Designer. Valid Values: 0 (plain text) 1 (bold text) 2 (italic text) 3 (bold and italic text)
